content: quote: Originally posted by sargeant_green: I think they just print more money Tom. They have printing presses in a few different cities. That's what I'm afraid of. When the Weimar Republic of Germany did this circa 1922 the resulting hyperinflation was a leading cause of Hitler coming to power. They were printing up so much cash that at one point the only printed the money on one side. Made for great scratch paper!
quote: Originally posted by sargeant_green: I think they just print more money Tom. They have printing presses in a few different cities.
